contexts.context: ...and night with headings "Horologium secundum eos qui diem <mark>maximum</mark> habent horarum aequinoctialium XVIII" and "Item horologium hellesponti ubi...
...horarum aequinoctialium XVIII" and "Item horologium hellesponti ubi dies <mark>maximum</mark> est horarum XV". Bubnov 1899, pp. 39-40.
